symptoms.name: headache
follow_up_questions: How severe is your headache on a scale of 1-10?
How long have you had this headache?
Where exactly is the pain located?
Do you have any other symptoms like nausea or sensitivity to light?
Did anything trigger this headache?

symptoms.name: fever
follow_up_questions: What is your temperature if you've measured it?
How long have you had the fever?
Do you have any other symptoms?
Are you able to keep fluids down?
Have you taken any medication for it?

symptoms.name: stomach pain
follow_up_questions: Where exactly is the pain located?
How would you describe the pain - sharp, dull, cramping?
When did it start?
Does eating make it better or worse?
Any nausea, vomiting, or changes in bowel movements?

symptoms.name: cough
follow_up_questions: Is it a dry cough or are you coughing up mucus?
How long have you been coughing?
Do you have any difficulty breathing?
Any other symptoms like fever or sore throat?

symptoms.name: sore throat
follow_up_questions: How severe is the pain when swallowing?
Do you have a fever?
Can you see any white patches when you look at your throat?
How long have you had it?
